title: CASA BONITA
text: Stan's house, day. Stan, Kenny, and Cartman watch TV from the couch. Cartman is eating a bowl of chips

title: CASA BONITA
text: Dude, I wonder where Kyle is.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Maybe he caught a disease and died. That'd be so awesome.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Dude that's not funny. You shouldn't joke about that.

title: CASA BONITA
text: (Yeah.)

title: CASA BONITA
text: Who's joking?

title: CASA BONITA
text: You guys! You guys! I have awesome news!

title: CASA BONITA
text: You have AIDS?

title: CASA BONITA
text: No. This Saturday, for my birthday, my Mom says she's takin' me to Casa Bonita, in Denver, and I get to invite three friends!.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Wow! Casa Bonita?!

title: CASA BONITA
text: (Woohoo!)

title: CASA BONITA
text: What's Casa Bonita?

title: CASA BONITA
text: Dude, haven't you ever been there?! It's a big Mexican restaurant where they have, like, cliff jumpers and Black Bart's Cave and  all kinds of stuff!

title: CASA BONITA
text: It's like the Disneyland of Mexican restaurants.

title: CASA BONITA
text: This Saturday! Awesone!  Casa Bonita! Casa Bonita! Food and fun in a festive atmosphere.  Casa Bonita!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Who said I'm inviting you?

title: CASA BONITA
text: You... your Mom said you could take three friends.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Yes. Three friends. You're not my friend.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Wuh ih uh... Weh come on, Kyle, who the hell else are you gonna take besides Stan and Kenny?

title: CASA BONITA
text: I'm gonna take Butters. He invited me to his birthday party last month, so I owe him one.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Butters?! You're gonna take THAT butthole?! Why?!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Because Butters isn't a total dick to me!

title: CASA BONITA
text: I have never been a dick to you.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Oh please! All you ever do is call me names and rip on me for being Jewish!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Kyle, when have I ever ripped on you for being a Jew?

title: CASA BONITA
role: [in the playground. Craig is there instead of Kenny] Oh yeah?!
text: Well you're a stupid Jew!

title: CASA BONITA
role: [in the playground, by the school's back doors] You're a Jew!

title: CASA BONITA
role: [in Cartman's room. Cartman is wearing a crown] Shut your God-damned
text: Jew mouth!

title: CASA BONITA
role: [at Kyle's house, on the front steps] Good job, Jew!

title: CASA BONITA
role: [singing the Dreidl song with Kyle's family and Stan] Jew...

title: CASA BONITA
role: [leaving his seat in class] Shutup Jew!

title: CASA BONITA
role: [at Cartman's house, with outfits] You're Jewish!!

title: CASA BONITA
role: [seated on a curb with the other boys] Dude, he's Jewish!

title: CASA BONITA
role: [on Nightline, seated next to Stan] Jew!

title: CASA BONITA
role: [at the side of a road, with Tweek and with their parents] Jew!

title: CASA BONITA
role: [next to stacks of lumber, as Kyle is about to whack him] Jew!

title: CASA BONITA
role: [at a barn, through a hole on the roof] Jew!

title: CASA BONITA
role: [Stan's room. Kyle reads a Bible] Jew?!

title: CASA BONITA
role: [At the Costa Rican rainforest, during practice] "I told you
text: Jewish people don't have rhythm." "Fuck off, Cartman"

title: CASA BONITA
text: Okay, except maybe for that one time.

title: CASA BONITA
text: You've always been a dick to me, Cartman, and I'm not inviting you.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Kyle, you don't understand! Casa Bonita is my most favorite place  in the whole world. I'll just, I'll just die if you don't take me! Please!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Sorry, my mind's made up.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Well fuck you, Kyle!! I don't wanna go to your faggy birthday party anyway! I'd much rather hang out at home than have to be around you and your Jew mom for a day!  Kiss my ball, asshole!! Dude, I totally didn't mean that, Kyle. Ah I really really wanna go to Casa Bonita. I'm sorry we had that fight just now. You know, I mean, I said some things, you said some things, but, I think it was good and we we've moved past it.

title: CASA BONITA
text: I'm not inviting you to Casa Bonita.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Well fuck you, Kyle!! I hope you die! I hope you fucking die!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Cartman's house, night. Cartman sleeps...

title: CASA BONITA
text: Casa Bonita! Come on, you guys!  Oh, awesome!!  Come on, you guys! Black Bart's Cave!  Wow, cliff divers!  More sopapillas, please!

title: CASA BONITA
text: I'm not inviting you, Cartman. You can't go.

title: CASA BONITA
text: No! Noooo!  Casa Bonita! Noooo!  AAAAH!! Oh... God-damnit, I have to get invited to go! I'm just gonna have to start being nice to Kyle!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Kyle's house, next day. Cartman approaches the front door in a nice sweater and rings the bell. Kyle answers

title: CASA BONITA
text: Hi Kyle.

title: CASA BONITA
text: That isn't it, Cartman.

title: CASA BONITA
text: What isn't it?

title: CASA BONITA
text: That's not being nice! That's just putting on a nice sweater!

title: CASA BONITA
text: ...I don't understand the difference.

title: CASA BONITA
text: I know you don't.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Jimmy! Hey Jimmy, wait up!  Dude, uh I need your help on something.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Well, sure, Eric. W-w-waht seems to be the p-p-p-prrroblem?

title: CASA BONITA
text: Well, everybody likes you, Jimmy, a-and you seem to be really good with people, so, I was wondering if you could tell me, how "do" you act nice to people?

title: CASA BONITA
text: Well, the best thing is not to act nice, Eric. Uh, the best thing is to be genuinely nice.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Okay, so how do you act genuinely nice to people?

title: CASA BONITA
text: Well, Eric, pah part of being nice is just making people smile and laugh. The best way to do that is by telling a fan-tastic joke or a humorius anti-d- ant'duhh ...antecdote.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Like what?

title: CASA BONITA
text: Well, like, try this one on for size: Knock knock.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Who's there?

title: CASA BONITA
text: Ing-mar ...Bergman.  Now you say, "Ingmar Bergman who?"

title: CASA BONITA
text: Take that, Jimmy!  And that! And don't you ever talk bad about Kyle again! Kyle is my friend! And if you say you had sex with his mom one more time, I'm gonna really let you have it! You hear me?!  Oh, Kyle. Hey.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Do you really think that beating up a handicapped kid is being nice?

title: CASA BONITA
text: Uh...  He-hey Kyle! Knock knock.  Knock knock, Kyle!

title: CASA BONITA
text: The school cafeteria. Cartman is looking at a picture. A tear wells up in his left eye. The picture's frame reads "I Had A Good Time at CASA BONITA," and the picture within is one of Cartman, his mom, and the mariachis in the background. He hears Kyle's excited voice.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Yeah, Casa Bonita, this Saturday!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Wow, that's gonna be so fun!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Yeah, it'll be awesome. Just the four of us.

title: CASA BONITA
text: (Yeah!)

title: CASA BONITA
text: The school hall, the bell rings. Red and Jordan walk one way, Kyle and Craig the opposite way. Keven opens up his locker. Kyle stops at his locker, and Cartman walks up

title: CASA BONITA
text: Hey Kyle.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Well?

title: CASA BONITA
text: Well what?

title: CASA BONITA
text: How are you going to try to get invited to Casa Bonita this time?

title: CASA BONITA
text: I'm not, Kyle. I know you already told Butters he could go.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Oh. Well... yeah. I, I did.

title: CASA BONITA
text: So, fine, Kyle, but honestly, I never meant to make you feel like you didn't matter at all to me. I know we argue all the time and I give you tons of crap, but we've also been through a, a lot together, and... maybe that alone doesn't make us friends, but it makes us something. So, ...whatever, you know, just... ah I hope... things will be cool.

title: CASA BONITA
text: I'm still not inviting you to Casa Bonita.

title: CASA BONITA
text: I know, Kyle. I'll see ya later.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Eh... hey, Cartman?  You really don't care that you can't go?

title: CASA BONITA
text: I care, sure, but I hope it doesn't mean you and me and Stan and Kenny can't hang out anymore.

title: CASA BONITA
text: That's exactly what I wanted to hear from you all along. Ah uh I still have to take Butters, but... I hope things can be cool too.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Good.

title: CASA BONITA
text: And, and hey, if for some reason Butters can't go to Casa Bonita, you can take his place.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Sweet, whatever.  Bingo!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Cartman's house, Friday night. Cartman leads Butters into his bedroom

title: CASA BONITA
text: What's this all about, Eric?

title: CASA BONITA
text: Butters, can you keep a secret?

title: CASA BONITA
text: Well, sure I can!

title: CASA BONITA
text: For the past five days I've been looking out into space for a school project. This morning, at 3:45 a.m. I... caught first sight of something terrible.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Nnn-how terrible?

title: CASA BONITA
text: A meteor. A meteor the size of Wyoming, heading right for earth.

title: CASA BONITA
text: What??

title: CASA BONITA
text: Now look, ah I could be wrong. I ...pray that I'm wrong, but, I just want you to take a look and... see what you think. Do you see anything?

title: CASA BONITA
text: I just see stars.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Keep looking. Sometimes it takes your eyes a minute to adjust.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Nope, uh I don't see any...  Oh wait. Oh my God! I see it. I see it! It's a meteor! Oh my God!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Oh my God! Does it look like it's getting closer?

title: CASA BONITA
text: It is! It is getting clsoer! Oh my God!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Oh my God! That meteor is the size of Wyoming and it's on a collision course for Earth.

title: CASA BONITA
text: When do you think uh it'll get here?

title: CASA BONITA
text: I, I don't know, I, have to do some calculations.  10 to the power of 1 base 9 divided by pi plus 5 minus 3. Oh Jesus.

title: CASA BONITA
text: What??

title: CASA BONITA
text: According to my calculations, that meteor is going to hit Earth in less than four hours.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Oh, you mean we're gonna die?!

title: CASA BONITA
text: No! No, Butters, we are going to live! Do you hear me?! We are going to live! We just... We've gotta find a bomb shelter!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Wha...? Where is there a bomb shelter??

title: CASA BONITA
text: Stan's Uncle Jimbo! He has a bomb shelter in his back yard! Come on, Butters! Hurry!

title: CASA BONITA
text: AAAAHH!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Jimbo's house. Cartman and Butters head for the bomb shelter

title: CASA BONITA
text: Oh Jeez!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Here we go! The bomb shelter's down here!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Oh God! Oh Jesus!

title: CASA BONITA
text: All right, we should be safe in here. This dried food and water should last us for weeks.

title: CASA BONITA
text: But what about everyone else? I have to tell my parents so they can come here, too.

title: CASA BONITA
text: No! Butters! I can't let you risk it. I'll go up and get the others.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Are you sure?

title: CASA BONITA
text: I'm not sure of anythng anymore.  Now Butters, listen: No matter what happens, no matter what you hear, do not come out! If I don't make it back in time with the others, then it will be up to you to repopulate the Earth.

title: CASA BONITA
text: But I'm the only one down here. What am I supposed to repopulate with?

title: CASA BONITA
text: Well, you know, with your wiener.  Just stay down here until you hear word from me. And... pray, Butters... pray for all mankind.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Oh God, oh God!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Kyle's house, Saturday night. Stan and Kenny are dressed in stripes, Sheila waits in a fur coat, Kyle is in his Sunday best checkig his watch

title: CASA BONITA
text: Where is Butters? We were supposed to leave here forty minutes ago.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Well I think we better just go without him, Kyle. It's getting late.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Yeah, screw him. Let's go.  Oh, finally!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Happy Birthday, Kyle. I just wanted to stop by and give you your present.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Oh. Thanks, dude.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Hope you have a good one. See you later.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Oh wait. Cartman.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Yes?

title: CASA BONITA
text: Uh Butters didn't show. You wanna go to Casa Bonita with us?

title: CASA BONITA
text: Butters didn't show? I I can't believe it. Uh are you sure you told him the right time and everything?

title: CASA BONITA
text: I told him 5:30 and we gotta get going. You in?

title: CASA BONITA
text: Well I... really would need to go home first and get my... Weh no no, I guess I have everything I need. Oh, okay, sure.

title: CASA BONITA
text: All right, let's go.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Okay, boys. Get in the car.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Casa Bonita, here we come! Casa Bonita! Casa Bonita!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Oh, hello Chris, Linda.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Hello everyone. Have any of you seen our son?

title: CASA BONITA
text: Butters was supposed to go with us to Casa Bonita tonight.

title: CASA BONITA
text: We know, but... he hasn't been home since last night. The police have been looking everywhere, but...  Well, thank you. Uh, please, let us know if you find out anything.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Oh Butters!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Aw dude, weak.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Yeah. Man, that sucks about Butters. Well, let's get going, shall we?

title: CASA BONITA
text: Nah. Dude, I c-I can't go to have a birthday party while Butters is missing.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Yeah, it's kinda weird.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Ee-yeah yeah. I think you're right, but, on the other hand, I think Butters would want us to go. You know Butters...

title: CASA BONITA
text: Nah, I can't. We should help look for him.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Yeah.

title: CASA BONITA
text: That's very good of you, boys. We can postpone Casa Bonita until next Saturday.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Next Saturday?? I'll never be able to keep Butters in the...  In the... depths of my heart for that long. I sure hope he... turns up before then.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Dude, we should check over at Stark's Pond. Butters always hangs out over there.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Yeah. And then we can try the football field.

title: CASA BONITA
text: I'll drive you boys.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Oh, God-damnit! How am I gonna keep Butters down in that bomb shelter for a whole week?!

title: CASA BONITA
text: South Park, Sunday. In front of the police station, Officer Barbrady stands by while one of his men issues the report to the crowd standing before the dais.

title: CASA BONITA
text: All right, folks, this is the little boy we're looking for:  Leopold Stotch, also known as Butters. He's been missing for two days and was last seen at the school. Let's go find him.

title: CASA BONITA
text: The bomb shelter. Butters has found the light switch and is enjoying the rations stored on the shelves along the wall

title: CASA BONITA
text: "Dried food rations. Add water to feed flavored square..."  Hello?  Hello??

title: CASA BONITA
text: Butters!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Hwaaaah!!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Butters! Oh God, it was... It was horrible!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Wuh, wait, well, what happened??

title: CASA BONITA
text: The meteor... struck the Earth sooner than I predicted. There was no time... no time...

title: CASA BONITA
text: What about my parents. Did you see them?

title: CASA BONITA
text: There was mass confusion! Pa... panic! People were crawling all over each other in the streets! It was... awful! When it hit, millions were evaporated instantly. The rest of us... walking around in a... cloud of... toxic... radiation.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Oh my God, let me see!

title: CASA BONITA
text: No Butters!! If you come up, you'll get infected too! You best wait for the radiatino level to go down. Probably... next week sometime. After Saturday. Ugh...

title: CASA BONITA
text: How many survivors are there? You should all come down here.

title: CASA BONITA
text: We can't come down there, or else, we'll contaminate you, Butters. No... we just have to survive the best we can.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Wow... Eric, I can never thank you enough for everything you've done for me.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Thank me by living, Butters. Live. And... rebuild.  I've got to go. Remember, wait one week for the toxic levels to go down. On Saturday.  G-goodbye!  All right. Just six days, Butters. Sit tight.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Police station, night. News 4 is covering another announcement by the police

title: CASA BONITA
text: Tom, it has now been three days since the Stotch child has gone missing. Townspeople continue to search, but hope... is dwindling.

title: CASA BONITA
text: All right, folks. I wanna thank you for all your efforts. Three days is a long time, but we've got to keep going if we're gonna find him.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Heh you're not going to find him. Not until after Saturday when I go to Casa Bonita.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Many times in cases like these a child can trap themselves. It is important that we spread our search to duct pipes, wells, and bomb shelters.

title: CASA BONITA
text: What what what?

title: CASA BONITA
text: I say we need to move the search to ducts, wells, and bomb shelters. Let's move out, people! Every second counts!

title: CASA BONITA
text: UUuuugh!!

title: CASA BONITA
text: But if you leave me now, you'll take away the biggest part of me.

title: CASA BONITA
role: Oo-oo-ooooo-oo girl, baby please don't go. Eh,

title: CASA BONITA
role: [the shelter lid opens again] Eric? [rises and looks up the shaft]
text: Eric, is that you?

title: CASA BONITA
text: Oh God! They're coming! They're coming! We'be gotta get out of here! They're coming this way!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Who's coming this way?

title: CASA BONITA
text: The cannibals! Don't you know? The meteor destroyed all of society, Butters. Now Earth is ruled by packs of wild humans gone mad! Those of us who survived are now being hunted by flesh-starved cannibals!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Oh God! I hate cannibals!

title: CASA BONITA
text: They're coming this way! I can hear them coming. They'll find you down here for sure. And when they do, they'll eat you alive.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Noooo!

title: CASA BONITA
text: We've gotta get you out of here! Come on! Oh oh no wait, I forgot! The toxic radiation! Hey wait! We can use this box!  There we go. This should keep you protected from the toxins.

title: CASA BONITA
text: But I can't see nothin'.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Believe me, Butters, you don't wanna see what's up there. Now come on. I'll guide you to a safer location.  There you go. Two more steps and you're at the top.  Good.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Are we out in the destruction?

title: CASA BONITA
text: Yes. There's nothing but smoldering bodies all around you. Burnt out buildings, and what used to be our town.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Aw man.

title: CASA BONITA
text: All right, this way, Butters. Just follow the sound of my voice.

title: CASA BONITA
text: An open field, night. Butters and Cartman are walking through the field behind a row of houses, far enough away so that no sound can reach them

title: CASA BONITA
text: Right now we're walking by what used to be people's houses, now just smoldering burnt piles of rubble.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Huh... Oh, it's terrible.

title: CASA BONITA
text: We're coming now to the crater where the meteor hit. A hole in the Earth over two miles in diameter.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Whoa!

title: CASA BONITA
text: The old gas station

title: CASA BONITA
text: Here we are at the old gas station. It survived a lot of the impact. We might be safe here.  Oh my God!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Whaaat??

title: CASA BONITA
text: It's a cannibal! Stay back, cannibal!

title: CASA BONITA
text: AAAAHH!

title: CASA BONITA
text: We've got to fight them off!  Stay away from Butters! He's humanity's last hope! Awww! He bit me! He bit off my hand!!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Waaaaaah!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Aw man, he's eating my hand like a piece of chicken! Can you hear the bones crack?

title: CASA BONITA
text: Ooohhhh!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Wait! Look here! There's a dead body with an axe in the back. I'll pull out the axe and use it to chop off the cannibal's head. Hunh!  Die!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Ooooh, what happened? What happened?!

title: CASA BONITA
text: The cannibal! The cannibal's dead, Butters! But he bit me,  which means soon I will have a taste for human flesh as well.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Oh no!

title: CASA BONITA
text: We have no choice, Butters! We have to lock you away somewhere where even I can't get to you!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Uh w-where??

title: CASA BONITA
text: Look! There's an old refrigerator! Get inside, Butters! I'll break off the handle so nobody can get to you!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Aren't you coming?

title: CASA BONITA
text: Too late for me. I can already feel my... body start to... change.  No! Must... fight... it... Don't open this door for anybody, Butters! No matter what you hear, stay inside for four days! Here's some water and food from the shelter.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Eric, you're the ...best friend in the whole world. I... I love you.

title: CASA BONITA
text: I love you too, man. I just  You look so delicious! Must eat your brains!

title: CASA BONITA
text: South Park, next day. Cartman is happily asleep in his bed and his alarm goes off.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Hah!  It's Wednesday! It's Wednesday! Only three more days till Casa Bonita. I'm gonna go through Black Bart's Cave first. No! I'm gonna watch the cliff divers first! Maybe if I tell them it's my birthday, they'll let me cliff-dive in the pool!  Oh, that would be so bad-ass!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Park County Trash Dump, night. The refrigerator is now there and begins to heave. Butters kicks his way out of it, having run out of air

title: CASA BONITA
text: Finally I can breathe a-  Oh my God. Oh my God, the meteor took out everything! It's all destroyed. Nothingn left. Hello? Are there any, are there any other survivors? Hello? Oh. That must have been where the library was. And that was probably the school. Hello? Oh. I forgot, I gotta watch out for readioactive cannibals.  Is that a cannibal? Sir? Ma'am?  Oh. Aww, it's a little dog.  Well, hello there, Mr. Dog. Looks like you and me are the only ones who survive the meteor, heh. We should stick together, huh, Mr. Dog? Well come on, we gotta start cleanin' up this mess, and rebuild this civilization. Boy, that meteor sure did make everything stinky.

title: CASA BONITA
text: South Park, day. On the highway, Sheila drives the boys towards their destination. All the boys are now wearing suits instead of sweaters. Stan, Cartman, and Kenny sit in the back seat

title: CASA BONITA
text: We're on our way to Casa Bonita! We're gonna be there very soon. You're gonna love Casa Bonita, Stan. There, there's this one part where you can dress up in Old Western clothes and get your photo taken in a fake jail.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Really?

title: CASA BONITA
text: Yeah, it's pretty cool.

title: CASA BONITA
text: "Pretty cool." So, um, should we go to Black Bart's Cave first or watch the puppet show? I think we should go through Black Bart's Cave right away 'cause, we're gonna wanna do it seven or eight times. And then we'll watch the cliff divers before the puppet show.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Dude, it's Kyle's birthday. We should do whatever he wants to do.

title: CASA BONITA
text: What? Fuck Kyle.  Ha ha, j-just kidding, birthday joke. Of course we'll do whatever Kyle wants, uh. Happy Birthday, Kyle.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Happy Birthday to you. Happy-

title: CASA BONITA
text: Birthday to you. Happy Birthday dear Kyle. Happy Birthday to you. .

title: CASA BONITA
text: Park County Trash Dump, day. A worker drives into the dump in her truck and pulls out stuffed trash bags from the truck bed.

title: CASA BONITA
text: You take away the biggest part of me. Woo-oo-ooooo-oo-oo, uh baby please don't go.  Woo-oo-ooooo-oo-oo, I just had to find my say to you tan...

title: CASA BONITA
text: Hello?

title: CASA BONITA
text: HAAAAGH! Who are you? Are you infected?

title: CASA BONITA
text: With what?

title: CASA BONITA
text: You're not a cannibal, are you?

title: CASA BONITA
text: No

title: CASA BONITA
text: Oh.  Oh good. You're a survivor, like me. Look, Mr. Dog, another survivor. And it's a lady, too. That means we can repopulate the earth. Yippee!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Kid, what are you doin' here?

title: CASA BONITA
text: I'm rebuilding society. Here, take a look.  This is the library, and over here is the bank. That over there I'm thinking into a P.F. Chang's or a Bennigan's. And this  is a memorial to Eric Cartman, the person who gave his life so that I could rebuild society. Well ma'am, I guess we should start repopulatin' the earth, huh?  I'm ready whenever you are.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Kid, I don't know what you think is going on, but this place is a dump.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Hey, that's not very nice! This is my first society! I'm doin' my best!

title: CASA BONITA
text: No, I mean you're at the garbage dump. The town is right over there, everybody is fine, and I think they've been looking for you for over a week.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Oh...  Ma'am, can I use your phone?

title: CASA BONITA
text: Casa Bonita, night. Sheila pulls into a parking space

title: CASA BONITA
text: We're here! We're here! Casa Bonita! Aw man, this is gonna be so great!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Wait up, Eric. We need to stay together. Uh, hold on boys, that's my cell phone. Hello? Yes. Oh, that's great!  Boys, they found Butters.  He's okay.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Oh, awesome.

title: CASA BONITA
text: I knew he'd turn up.

title: CASA BONITA
text: Yes, Eric Cartman is with us. Why? Oh really?

title: CASA BONITA
text: What?

title: CASA BONITA
text: Yes, I will certainly let him know. Thank you.  Well, it appears that Eric here is responsible for Butters missing, because he wanted to go to Casa Bonita.

title: CASA BONITA
text: What?

title: CASA BONITA
text: Eric, the South Park Police are already on their way here to have a little talk with you!

title: CASA BONITA
text: But... Casa Bonita.

title: CASA BONITA
text: I should have known better! You never cared about my birthday at all!

title: CASA BONITA
text: But I...  but...  Stand back!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Cartman, stop it!

title: CASA BONITA
text: I... am going... to Casa... Bonita!

title: CASA BONITA
text: It's too late, fatass.  They'll be here in less than a minute.

title: CASA BONITA
text: \ Ah! Eh. Nuh!  Less than a minute! Less than a minute!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Casa Bonita, inside. Cartman races into the restaurant

title: CASA BONITA
text: Oh, awesome!!  Excuse me, excuse me? Can I get to eat some of your-  Thank you. Thank you.  Oh, I've got to get to Black Bart's Cave!  Ah! Excuse me? Excuse me! Coming through to Black Bart's Cave!  Oh!  Oh, scary! Look, a skeleton! Oh man, I'm so scared!  Oh! Oh! Oh, that was awesome! Oh! Oh! Cliff divers! Come on! Come on, dive!  Dive, asshole! Oh, awesome! That was cool, huh?  Whoa. Sopapillas! Can I get some sopapillas please?!  Sweeet!  Oh! Booth! Puppet show! Puppet show!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Cartman!

title: CASA BONITA
text: All right, kid! End of the line!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Ah.  Uh.  Yeeeesss!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Jesus Christ!

title: CASA BONITA
text: Well kid, you made an entire town panic, you lost all your friends, and now you're going to Juvenile Hall for a week! Huh, was it wirth it?

title: CASA BONITA
text: Totally.
